nodes.text: The 128th Fighter Group served the Galactic Empire's starfighter corps utilizing TIE/IN interceptors. The fighter group was an elite Imperial unit alongside the 181st Imperial Fighter Wing.

The 128th Fighter Group was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the thirty-third issue of the De Agostini magazine Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon, published in 2015. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, the unit first appeared as the 128th TIE Interceptor Squadron in the 1998 LucasArts video game Star Wars: Rogue Squadron.
